metadata.dc:description: The vaccines have decreased the frequency of infectious diseases until control or eradication. In this situation, some people forget the benefits of vaccines, they consider unscientific and false aspects and are not vaccinated. Occur "bags" of susceptible individuals and cases of disease. The current measles situation is an example. We need to "give value to vaccines", disseminate their achievements and make a permanent promotion of their great benefits and safety
metadata.dc:title: El valor de las vacunas en el momento actual.
[The value of vaccines in the present moment].
